title: duplicate emails
content:
I see that others have had the same problem as me. My trash folder has many thousands of duplicate emails. If I block delete them it will take days to complete. So 3 questions 1. How do I stop duplicate emails in my trash. After deleting many reappear with the date 01/01/1970 2. Is there a faster way of deleting. I use select email>shift key>find last email>delete 3. Is there a limit to how many emails I can put into the block mentioned in #2

Image attached at

link text
creator: keithinoz1

title: email not downloading from server onto my iMac.
content:
my email stopped downloading on my iMac (2010 model) after November 15th 2023. I was told it was because it was so old, the security protocols were out of date. I bought the latest iMac (M3 chip) but I still can't download my email. I can send an email from the Mac, and I receive emails on my iPhone, just not my computer. I have the latest version of Thunderbird. 115.7.0 (64 bit). I have deleted some emails, and those will re-download (which is weird) but nothing new. It will show on the bottom left "downloading 1 of 538", but never downloads.

Please help!

Jack.
creator: jaclby
